verbs.description: Pope Francis [V: has] criticized the Trump administration ’s policy of separating migrant families at the Mexican border , saying populism is not the answer to the world ’s immigration problems .

[ARG0: Pope Francis] has [V: criticized] [ARG1: the Trump administration ’s policy of separating migrant families at the Mexican border] , [ARGM-PRD: saying populism is not the answer to the world ’s immigration problems] .

Pope Francis has criticized the Trump administration ’s policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: migrant families] [ARGM-LOC: at the Mexican border] , saying populism is not the answer to the world ’s immigration problems .

[ARG0: Pope Francis] has criticized the Trump administration ’s policy of separating migrant families at the Mexican border , [V: saying] [ARG1: populism is not the answer to the world ’s immigration problems] .

Pope Francis has criticized the Trump administration ’s policy of separating migrant families at the Mexican border , saying [ARG1: populism] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: the answer to the world ’s immigration problems] .
